class.name: PolyCapsule2D
class.description: Builds a polygon outline closely approximating a capsule in 2D (also known as "stadium").

members.member: Capsule's total height. When [code]height == 0.0[/code], then a circle is generated instead.
Represents the maximum gap in pixels allowed between capsule's half circle segment and the boundary of the mathematical circle, with low values increasing the accuracy.
Capsule's semicircle radius, applies to both ends.
